arm_group.description: cross-sectional, observational study of community dwelling young Chinese adults

brief_summary.textblock: To describe the normal range of muscle mass and function in Chinese adults.

clinical_study.brief_title: Muscle Mass and Function in Chinese Adults

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:

          1. Young adult ages between 25 and 34 years

          2. Adult is judged to be in good health

          3. Adult with BMI between 18.5 and 26.9

          4. Male or non-pregnant non-lactating female

        Exclusion Criteria:

          1. Subject who is heavy manual labor

          2. Subject who is professional or semi-professional athlete or game player

          3. Subject who has physical disabilities, such as loss of hand or foot or limbs or any
             physical disability which may affect the physical activities and affect the
             distribution of muscle mass

          4. Subject has known chronic diseases such as endocrine system diseases, cardiovascular
             diseases, liver diseases, and renal diseases

          5. Subject who has active infection of TB, HIV and hepatitis

          6. Subject currently experiencing diarrhea or anorexia within 7days prior to the
             enrollment

          7. Subject who has or plans for intensive physical activities 3 days prior to the
             scheduled BIA measurement.

          8. Subject who has thyroid malfunction

          9. Subject has implanted electronic device or orthopedic metal implantations

         10. Subject with drug or alcohol addiction.

         11. Subject with anemia

         12. Subject is malnourished

         13. Subject has active cancers

         14. Subject has lost or gained more than 5% of body weight in the past 3 months

study_pop.textblock: Cross-sectional, observational study of young Chinese adults

clinical_study.official_title: Muscle Mass and Function in Chinese Adults

required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on June 04, 2014
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.
